tweet: In order to keep these workers and residents safe, nursing homes must be required to:  ➡️Implement appropriate staff-to-resident ratios.  ➡️Invest sufficiently in employee wages and facility operations.

tweet: Sexual harassment is pervasive, corrosive, and has been a silent barrier for women in the workplace for far too long.   Thank you @GovKathyHochul and to the bill sponsors for enacting new laws to combat sexual harassment in New York.

tweet: New Jersey’s attempt to terminate this commission is unlawful, ill-advised, and infringes on our joint efforts to protect our shared waterways.  We will fight to ensure this commission remains intact and our communities benefit from its important work.

tweet: @PatriciaFahy109 I’m so sorry, Pat.  Sending all of my love and prayers to you and your family.

name: NY AG James
tweet: 28 years ago, Ari Halberstam, a 16-year old yeshiva student, was murdered in a terrorist attack on the Brooklyn Bridge. May his memory be a blessing.   Antisemitism cannot and will not be tolerated in New York.

name: NY AG James
tweet: আমাদের কমিউনিটির সবাই যাতে গুরুতর আবহাওয়া সম্পর্কে কার্যকরভাবে সতর্ক হয়ে ক্ষতি থেকে বেঁচে থাকতে পারে সেটা নিশ্চিত করতে @NWS-কে অবশ্যই ইংরেজি ও স্পেনিশ ছাড়াও অন্যান্য ভাষায় গুরুতর আবহাওয়া সতর্কতা পাঠাতে হবে।   জীবন বাঁচানোর ক্ষেত্রে ভাষা কখনোই বাঁধা হয়ে উঠা উচিত নয়।

tweet: গত বছর নিউ ইয়র্ক সিটিতে ঘূর্ণিঝড় আইডার সময় নিউ ইয়র্কবাসীরা @NWS থেকে শুধু ইংরেজি ও স্পেনিশ ভাষায় গুরুতর আবহাওয়া সতর্কতা পেয়েছিলেন।   প্রাণ হারানো নিউ ইয়র্কবাসীদের প্রায় প্রত্যেকেরই প্রধান ভাষা ইংরেজি বা স্পেনিশ ছিল না।

name: NY AG James
tweet: @NWS dwe voye alèt meteyo grav li yo nan plis lang pase sèlman angle ak panyòl pou asire tout kominote yo jwenn bonjan alèt konsènan move tan epi gen chans pou yo chape poul yo.   Lang pa ta dwe janm yon baryè pou sove lavi.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Lè ouragan Ida te fè dega atravè Vil New York ane pase, Nouyòkè yo te resevwa alèt sou meteyo grav sou tanpèt la nan men @NWS sèlman nan lang angle ak panyòl.   Lang prensipal prèske tout Nouyòkè ki te pèdi lavi yo pa te ni angle ni panyòl.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Язык никогда не должен быть препятствием для спасения жизней.

name: NY AG James
tweet: @NWS должна рассылать сигнал тревоги об экстремальных метеоусловиях на многих языках, а не только на английском и испанском для того, чтобы все наше местное население было эффективно предупреждено об экстремальных метеоусловиях и имело возможность избежать опасности.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Когда в прошлом году ураган «Ида» пронесся по Нью-Йорку, жители Нью-Йорка получили сигнал тревоги об экстремальных метеоусловиях от @NWS только на английском и испанском языках.   Английский или испанский не был основным языком для большинства из погибших жителей Нью-Йорка.

name: NY AG James
tweet: @NWS 는 심각한 기상 상황에 대한 경고를 영어와 스페인어 뿐만 아니라 기타 다른 언어로도 전하여 전 지역사회가 효과적으로 심각한 기상 사태에 대한 통보를 받을 수 있고 위험을 피할 수 있게 해야 합니다.   생명을 지켜야 하는 상황에 언어가 장애가 되어서는 안 됩니다.

name: NY AG James
tweet: 지난해 허리케인 아이다가 뉴욕시를 휩쓸었을 때, @NWS 는 뉴욕 시민들에게 심각한 기상 사태에 대한 소식을 영어와 스페인어로만 전했습니다.   당시 목숨을 잃은 뉴욕 시민 대부분은 모국어가 영어나 스페인어가 아닌 이들이었습니다.

name: NY AG James
tweet: @NWS 必须以英语和西班牙语以外的更多语言发送恶劣天气警报，以确保所有的社区都能够收到有效的恶劣天气警告，并有机会摆脱危险。   语言不应成为拯救生命的障碍。

name: NY AG James
tweet: 去年，当飓风艾达席卷纽约市时，纽约人只收到了@NWS 以英语和西班牙语发布风暴恶劣天气警报。   几乎所有丧生的纽约人的主要语言都不是英语或西班牙语。

name: NY AG James
tweet: @NWS 必須以除了英語和西班牙語之外的更多種語言發送其惡劣天氣警報，確保我們所有社區都收到有效的惡劣天氣警示，並且有機會遠離危險。   語言絕不應該成為拯救生命的障礙。

name: NY AG James
tweet: 當颶風艾達在去年席捲紐約市時，紐約人只收到了來自 @NWS 的英語和西班牙語有關風暴的惡劣天氣警報。  所有喪生的紐約人幾乎主要語言都並非英語或西班牙語。

name: NY AG James
tweet: El @NWS debe enviar alertas de clima severo en más idiomas no solo inglés y español para asegurar que todas las comunidades sean alertadas del clima severo efectivamente y puedan salir del peligro.   El idioma nunca debe ser una barrera para salvar vidas.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Cuando el huracán Ida destruyó la ciudad de Nueva York el año pasado, los neoyorquinos solo recibieron alertas de clima severo sobre la tormenta del @NWS en inglés y español.  El idioma principal de casi todos los neoyorquinos que perdieron la vida no era el inglés o el español.

name: NY AG James
tweet: The @NWS must send its severe weather alerts in more languages than just English and Spanish to ensure all of our communities are effectively warned of severe weather and have a chance to get out of harm's way.  Language should never be a barrier to saving lives.

name: NY AG James
tweet: When Hurricane Ida tore across New York City last year, New Yorkers only received severe weather alerts about the storm from the @NWS in English and Spanish.  The primary language of nearly every New Yorker who lost their life was not English or Spanish.

name: NY AG James
tweet: While we honor and celebrate women's history, we must keep fighting for a society that's truly equal for women in America.     Like those who came before us, our work is paramount to a future that will make us all proud.

name: NY AG James
tweet: The sheroes who came before us fought tirelessly so future generations of women could live in a more equal society.     They paved the way for the women of our time, and their achievements are felt across our nation every single day. #WomensHistoryMonth

name: NY AG James
tweet: My heart is heavy to learn that we’ve lost GuiYing Ma, and I’m sending my deepest condolences to her husband and entire family.  These hateful acts of violence against our Asian communities must come to an end. #StopAsianHate

name: NY AG James
tweet: I was proud to join @DC9_IUPAT in Queens for the re-opening of its training center.   For over 100 years, the members of @DC9_IUPAT have worked tirelessly to improve the infrastructure of our state, and this center will help keep that going for years to come.  https://t.co/jelYc5LdHL

name: NY AG James
tweet: Utility companies have a responsibility to ensure their customer’s bills are fair and accurate.  My office will hold them to that standard and protect New Yorker’s wallets.

name: NY AG James
tweet: With thousands of New Yorkers getting sudden, unexplained spikes in their @ConEdison bills, we’re demanding answers.  @ConEdison must provide an explanation and communicate any future rate increases early on so New Yorkers know what to expect.

name: NY AG James
tweet: ¡Feliz Día de la Independencia Dominicana, Nueva York! 🇩🇴  Pasé la tarde en Inwood celebrando todo lo que los neoyorquinos dominicanos contribuyen a nuestra ciudad y al estado.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Happy Dominican Independence Day, New York! 🇩🇴  Spent the afternoon in Inwood celebrating everything Dominican New Yorkers contribute to making our city and state a better place.  https://t.co/vh5fSiIhXp

name: NY AG James
tweet: Black Americans have helped build this nation, and our contributions can be felt in every corner of our society.   As Langston Hughes said, “I, too, sing America.” #BlackHistoryMonth  https://t.co/0gLWI1Z48C

name: NY AG James
tweet: Today, I’m thinking of Trayvon Martin and every community that felt the pain of his death ten years ago.  Trayvon’s memory will always be with us as we continue to fight for justice and equity in our nation.

name: NY AG James
tweet: This is a cheap political ploy that comes at the dangerous expense of vulnerable children.    Trans rights are human rights, and we must fight back against these hateful, transphobic policies.  https://t.co/FryVhRLLip

name: NY AG James
tweet: Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson has dedicated her career to serving and upholding the rule of the law, and she will continue to do just that as the first Black woman to serve as a U.S. Supreme Court Justice.  Congratulations on your historic nomination to the Supreme Court.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Donald Trump was ordered to comply with my investigation into his financial dealings. He has the right to seek a delay, but he can't deter us from following the facts.  Make no mistake: We will continue to pursue this case without fear or favor because no one is above the law.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Insurance companies should not be trying to dominate the market during a devastating pandemic.  We will fight to ensure New Yorkers can benefit from competitive healthcare markets and have access to quality, affordable healthcare services.

name: NY AG James
tweet: The proposed merger of @UnitedHealthGrp and @Change_HC will hurt Americans, bringing lower quality healthcare services at a higher cost for New Yorkers and people across the country.  My office is filing a lawsuit with @TheJusticeDept and @AGEllison to block this merger.
mentions: [{'screen_name': 'unitedhealthgrp', 'name': 'unitedhealth group', 'id': '917104380'}, {'screen_name': 'change_hc', 'name': 'change healthcare', 'id': '37701900'}, {'screen_name': 'thejusticedept', 'name': 'justice department', 'id': '73181712'}, {'screen_name': 'agellison', 'name': 'attorney general keith ellison', 'id': '1095089718264512514'}]

name: NY AG James
tweet: Praying for Ukraine and for all of the Ukrainian families here in New York.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Brooks-Church and Gendville unlawfully evicted tenants of 1214 Dean Street in Brooklyn, pushing New Yorkers out of their homes during an unprecedented pandemic.  Mistreating tenants in New York will never be tolerated.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Today, @NYCMayor and I took down two slumlords who were grossly mistreating New York tenants and running illegal short-term rentals.  Gennaro Brooks-Church and Loretta Gendville will surrender their $2 million property and it will be used for affordable housing.

name: NY AG James
tweet: My office recovered these funds from sham charities that defrauded well-intending New Yorkers to line their own pockets.  Stopping fraudsters from taking advantage of New Yorkers will always be a priority.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Today, I'm proud to deliver over $640,000 to five nonprofit organizations that are leading the fight against breast cancer.  These nonprofits are devoted to battling breast cancer and supporting patients and survivors, and these funds will help them continue their important work.  https://t.co/PnjnwFK4Tc

name: NY AG James
tweet: This is a major, long-overdue victory for @USWNT and women everywhere. I am proud to see these incredible athletes breaking barriers yet again.   All women deserve equal pay for equal work.  https://t.co/lKlV5kaECW

name: NY AG James
tweet: Green National must immediately correct these conditions and maintain full-time security at a building where an elderly tenant was murdered last year, and another tenant was shot last month.  Landlords cannot shirk their responsibilities at the expense of New York families.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Green National has ignored unsanitary and dangerous conditions in its buildings, from human waste and drug paraphernalia to criminal activity, inadequate security, and broken elevators.  No one should have to endure these horrifying conditions at the place they call home.

name: NY AG James
tweet: We're holding Green National accountable for allowing uninhabitable living conditions in its affordable housing properties in Syracuse.    New Yorkers have a right to livable, safe homes.  https://t.co/VHKLs6PS64

name: NY AG James
tweet: John Lewis was a champion of voting rights, spending his career fighting for free and fair access to the ballot box.  On his birthday, I’m thinking of our collective fight to continue his work and ensure we create a democracy that would make him proud.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Today I stopped by the Astor Place @Starbucks to get a #UnionStrong coffee and talk to the partners of @SBWorkersUnited about their fight for the right to organize.  From New York City to Buffalo and beyond, the partners of @SBWorkersUnited will always have my support.  https://t.co/txxeuAdzWJ

name: NY AG James
tweet: Happy #PresidentsDay, New York!  Today we honor the leaders of our nation who have dedicated themselves to upholding our democracy and protecting our right to freedom, liberty, and justice.

name: NY AG James
tweet: My heart is with the family of Elizabeth Howell and the entire @sunypotsdam1816 community feeling the pains of senseless gun violence this weekend.  May she rest in peace.  https://t.co/d4UGg3lNFI

name: NY AG James
tweet: This week, justice prevailed.   No one is above the law, no matter how powerful they are.   https://t.co/7LzOmdnN30

name: NY AG James
tweet: Happy Year of the Tiger, New York City!  It was great to be back in Chinatown for the #LunarNewYear Parade to stand together against the hateful attacks on our Asian American communities and for strength, courage, and perseverance in the new year.  https://t.co/lGQEzK2sxy

name: NY AG James
tweet: Thousands of New Yorkers are getting refunds after being misled about their #COVID19 test result times.   Any testing sites and labs that deceive New Yorkers can expect to hear from my office.  https://t.co/pqdoplaJHm

name: NY AG James
tweet: We're suing Shirley and Tyrone Goddard for stealing $1 million from H.O.M.E., a Syracuse-based charity that helps developmentally disabled individuals.   Cheating organizations that work tirelessly to help our most vulnerable won't be tolerated.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Donald Trump, Donald Trump Jr., and Ivanka Trump must all comply with this court order and testify before my office within 21 days.  No one is above the law.

name: NY AG James
tweet: #BREAKING: Today, a court ruled in our favor that Donald Trump must appear before my office as part of our investigation into his financial dealings.  No one will be permitted to stand in the way of the pursuit of justice, no matter how powerful they are.

name: NY AG James
tweet: @petershankman You’re right, we really should have branched out.

name: NY AG James
tweet: The safety of New Yorkers is always our top priority.  If you have found an Apple AirTag that may have been misused in your belongings, contact us:   https://t.co/sLV2owMatv

name: NY AG James
tweet: Keep an eye on your belongings and use these tips from my office:  🔊Listen for unfamiliar beeping   ❗️Watch for “Item Detected Near You” notifications on iPhones  📄Check for updated guidance   ⚙️Update your Apple device’s operating system  ⬇️More:   https://t.co/SPevcujFVE

name: NY AG James
tweet: There have been concerning reports of bad actors using Apple AirTags to track people's locations and personal belongings, and we're issuing guidance to help New Yorkers stay safe.  Tracking people without their awareness is a serious crime, and we won't tolerate it.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Companies must follow the law and accurately advertise when New Yorkers can expect their test results.  If you think you have been misled, contact my office:  https://t.co/AnrxKM3prY

name: NY AG James
tweet: We're putting over $400,000 back into the pockets of thousands of New Yorkers who paid for expedited #COVID19 test results and were misled by ClearMD Health and @sameday_testing.  We won't allow #COVID19 testing sites and labs to deceive New Yorkers.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Four years ago, 17 people were murdered in the mass shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Florida.  Today, I'm thinking of the Parkland community and every community across our country that has felt the pains of senseless gun violence. #MSDStrong

name: NY AG James
tweet: I'm proud to stand with Senator @gillibrandny today to support her legislation to fight human trafficking and aid the victims and survivors of these horrors.  These bills will help us combat this pervasive issue that too often goes unseen.  https://t.co/LFw6q6Vp7Z

name: NY AG James
tweet: 113 years ago, the @NAACP was created to combat discrimination, lead the way in advancing civil rights, and work toward a more equal and equitable nation.  New York is grateful for everything this historic organization does day in and day out. #BlackHistoryMonth

name: NY AG James
tweet: This year's Super Bowl marks the first major sports event since online gambling became legal in New York.  Use these tips from my office to help avoid falling victim to misleading ads on social media and streaming sites.  https://t.co/1tNgtPGnQS

name: NY AG James
tweet: New York: This Super Bowl Sunday, keep the odds in your favor and be aware of deceptive online sports betting companies trying to game your gamble.  Before you place your bet, do your research on the platform you're using and read the fine print of any promotional offers.  https://t.co/zpdXIWiKTY

name: NY AG James
tweet: From Buffalo to New York City and Long Island, New York is a union state.  The workers united will never be defeated, and I fully support the partners of @SBWorkersUnited in their continued fight with @WorkersUnitedNY for the fair treatment they deserve.

name: NY AG James
tweet: My heart is with the Buffalo community tonight after the shooting at McKinley High School.  I’m praying that the student and school security officer who suffered injuries make a full recovery.

name: NY AG James
tweet: New Yorkers are doing their part to get vaccinated, get boosted, and protect their communities.  We're doing our part to protect you too.  https://t.co/6fDcKcfR8E

name: NY AG James
tweet: These antisemitic acts of hate and violence are abhorrent, and we cannot tolerate them in any corner of New York.  I urge anyone with information to contact @NYPDHateCrimes immediately.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Any New Yorker who was charged an administrative fee for a #COVID19 vaccination should contact my office:    https://t.co/aOj6tKelsC

name: NY AG James
tweet: We found that 450 New Yorkers were wrongly charged fees when they got their #COVID19 vaccine and we’ve secured thousands of dollars in refunds from pharmacies in Manhattan and Brooklyn.  #COVID19 vaccines are free for all New Yorkers.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Every day, we feel the horrors of gun violence in every corner of our country.  During #GVSurvivorsWeek, we must honor the lives of those we’ve lost and continue our work to stop this violence and protect all of our communities.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Nantasha Williams knows what it's like to fight for her community, and Southeast Queens is lucky to have her as their next Council Member for the 27th District.     Congratulations, @CMNantashaW!

name: NY AG James
tweet: We're in Queens for the Flushing #LunarNewYear parade to celebrate and wish everyone a prosperous, healthy, and happy Year of the Tiger!    I hope this new year brings you strength, courage, and perseverance.  https://t.co/ALXOdBaTEW

name: NY AG James
tweet: We know that it can be difficult to tell the difference between toy guns and real, dangerous firearms.   This important legislation will help protect our communities from future tragedies in New York.

name: NY AG James
tweet: An Upper Manhattan building was overcharging rent-stabilized tenants for years, and after our investigation, we’re getting these tenants tens of thousands of dollars back in refunds.  I won't allow New Yorkers to be exploited by bad-acting landlords.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Today, I met with @POTUS and other New York leaders to discuss how we can fight the gun violence epidemic in New York.  I look forward to working with this administration to protect our communities and get dangerous firearms off our streets.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Antisemitism will never be tolerated in New York.   I urge anyone with information about this individual to contact @NYPDHateCrimes immediately.  https://t.co/QP0UFPqjC4

name: NY AG James
tweet: One year ago, Brooklyn’s 227 Abolitionist Place became a historic landmark.  We fought to protect this site so this important piece of Black history in New York is never lost. #BlackHistoryMonth  https://t.co/AnxtCMCWzN

name: NY AG James
tweet: My office is filing a lawsuit against @SafeguardMetals with a coalition of 26 AGs and the @CFTC for defrauding seniors out of nearly $68 million in sham precious metal investments.     We won't allow fraudsters to take advantage of New Yorkers.

name: NY AG James
tweet: Black history is American history.   From the Greensboro Four's sit-in against segregation at the lunch counter on February 1, 1960, to our fight against the attacks on voting rights today, Black history has and will continue to help shape this nation.
